description: Laura Ingraham calls out several Republicans for kowtowing to Democrats in Congress, saying they would rather satisfy liberals than conservatives on "The Ingraham Angle."

title: Meghan Markle headlines Indiana event for women’s empowerment
description: Meghan Markle spoke at an event for the empowerment of women and girls in Indianapolis on Tuesday, which was hosted by the Women’s Fund of Central Indiana.

title: GREG GUTFELD: The left cannot condemn heinous acts if it means agreeing with a Republican
description: Fox News host Greg Gutfeld's breaks down the left's unwillingness to condemn 'bad stuff' if it forces them to agree with a Republican on 'Gutfeld!'

title: Sean Hannity: Twitter's war on free expression is now officially over
description: Sean Hannity voiced concern over the latest threats against freedom of speech in America and how Elon Musk is lifting the veil on Twitter's past censorship.

title: Idaho police appear to reverse course, do not know if 'residence or any occupants were specifically targeted'
description: Officials investigating the quadruple homicide at the University of Idaho now say they "do not currently know if the residence or any occupants were specifically targeted."

title: More voters picked Republicans than Democrats in November. Can GOP restore sanity to Congress?
description: Americans had been told that they might see a 'red wave' on November 8. But Republicans could not seal the deal. Will the GOP now use Congress to woo independent voters?

title: Friend of Iran midfielder killed by 'security forces' for celebrating World Cup loss to US: report
description: A 27-year-old Iranian man, a friend of Saeid Ezatolahi of Iran's World Cup team, was reportedly shot dead for celebrating the country's loss to the U.S. in protest.

title: University of Idaho murder victim's father says his daughter died ‘in the same bed’ as her best friend
description: The father of University of Idaho murder victim Kaylee Goncalves said on Wednesday that his only comfort is that his daughter died right next to her best friend.

title: Mena Suvari says she struggles with postpartum depression 'every day' more than a year after giving birth
description: Mena Suvari opened up about her constant postpartum depression in a podcast episode that aired Wednesday, saying she struggles with it every day since giving birth in 2021.

title: Prince William, Kate Middleton watch courtside as Boston Celtics take on Miami Heat during their US trip
description: Prince William and Kate Middleton attended a Boston Celtics game at TD Garden in Boston on Wednesday night. The couple walked into the arena shortly before the game began.

title: Taylor Lorenz warns new Twitter COVID policy will cause ‘more deaths’
description: Washington Post reporter Taylor Lorenz published a report Tuesday warning that Twitter's removal of its COVID misinformation policy would lead to "more deaths."

title: Kyler Murray fires back at Patrick Peterson's criticism: 'You on some weird s---'
description: The Arizona Cardinals' Kyler Murray has responded to former teammate Patrick Peterson's criticism of the QB suggesting Murray only cares about himself.

title: Atlanta police seek public's help identifying shooting suspects
description: Atlanta police are asking for the public's help in identifying individuals captured on surveillance video near Market Street in connection to a shooting.

title: LA County DA takes keen interest in John Legend car theft case, prosecutor calls it insult to crime victims
description: The Los Angeles County District Attorney's Office has taken a special interest in a case involving a suspect who allegedly tried to steal John Legend’s Porsche

title: TUCKER CARLSON: Zelenskyy, Yellen and Bankman-Fried could use federal investigations, but are celebrated
description: Fox News host Tucker Carlson weighs in on the impact of the U.S. government still sending funds to Ukraine following the Russian invasion on "Tucker Carlson Tonight."

title: Fight between Jets and Avalanche fans turns bloody
description: A fight broke out between fans of the NHL's Colorado Avalanche and Winnipeg Jets Tuesday night, and it turned bloody when a Winnipeg fan hit the boards.

title: Waukesha Christmas parade killer Darrell Brooks files notice to appeal his conviction
description: Waukesha Christmas parade killer Darrell Brooks filed a notice to appeal his Nov. 16, 2022 conviction of six life sentences.

title: Users celebrate Elon Musk revealing Twitter 'interfered in elections:' ‘New Twitter rocks’
description: Elon Musk revealed on Twitter Wednesday that the social media company "interfered in elections" prior to it coming under his ownership.

title: JESSE WATTERS: Mom who allegedly drove car through BLM protesters to escape knows deep down she is not guilty
description: Jesse Watters asks what one would do in a situation similar to a mother who allegedly drove her car through a group of protesters in 2020 on "Jesse Watters Primetime."

title: Vikings' Patrick Peterson rips into Kyler Murray after Cardinals' latest loss
description: Minnesota Vikings cornerback Patrick Peterson didn't hold back when speaking about his former teammate, Kyler Murray, after the Arizona Cardinals' loss on Sunday.

title: Brittany Aldean throws out Balenciaga bags following controversial ad campaign involving children: 'Trash day'
description: Brittany Aldean was among the celebrities criticizing Balenciaga after backlash to its holiday ad campaign, which showed children holding teddy bears in sexually suggestive costumes.

title: Idaho college murder investigators hit roadblock in search for knife origin: 'No real help'
description: University of Idaho students Ethan Chapin, 20; Kaylee Goncalves, 21; Xana Kernodle, 20; and 21-year-old Madison Mogen were stabbed several times and killed on November 13.

title: Anne Heche estate appoints son Homer Laffoon as general administrator after months-long court battle
description: James Tupper, Anne Heche's ex-boyfriend, opposed Homer Laffoon's bid to become general administrator of her estate after her death in LA on Aug. 11. Heche was 53.

title: Las Vegas Strip suspect drives on sidewalk, arrested after 'barricade situation,' police say
description: A suspect who drove on the sidewalk and refused to stop for authorities was arrested Wednesday in Las Vegas, police said.

title: Biden appears to declare himself the greatest president in US history
description: President Biden, while speaking at the Tribal Nations Summit at the Department of Interior on Wednesday, all but claimed to be the greatest president in U.S. history.

title: Hall of Famer Terrell Owens claims self-defense in incident outside CVS store
description: Retired NFL wide receiver Terrell Owens said the fight caught on camera in which he punched a man in a CVS parking lot started because an "aggressor" directed threats towards him.

title: Rams' Aaron Donald to miss first game due to injury in his career
description: All-Pro defensive tackle Aaron Donald will miss his first game with the Los Angeles Rams due to injury in his career Sunday after suffering a high-ankle sprain.

title: Colorado election officials order recount after Rep. Boebert projected to defeat Dem challenger Adam Frisch
description: Colorado Secretary of State Jena Griswold has ordered a recount of the 3rd Congressional District, where incumbent Rep. Lauren Boebert is projected to defeat Democrat Adam Frisch.

title: Extinction activist wants humans to voluntarily die out: ‘Feed ‘em, don’t breed ‘em’
description: Dr. Phil hosted a debate about whether the world was overpopulated with humans and on the ethics of procreation, especially when some people cannot afford to support them.

title: Mickey Joseph, Nebraska's interim coach before Matt Rhule hire, arrested in domestic case
description: Mickey Joseph, who was the interim head coach of Nebraska before they hired Matt Rhule, was arrested on Wednesday for strangulation and third-degree assault.

title: New DHS Disinfo Board documents reveal deep Big Tech collusion, contradict Mayorkas testimony: Sen. Hawley
description: In an open letter to DHS Secretary Mayorkas Wednesday, Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., said newly obtained documents reveal a more extensive scope of the Disinformation Governance Board.

title: Fleetwood Mac’s Christine McVie mourned by Stevie Nicks, Mick Fleetwood: ‘See you on the other side, my love’
description: Stevie Nicks, Mick Fleetwood and more musicians are mourning the late Christine McVie after the Fleetwood Mac singer's death Wednesday following a short illness.

title: New York lawmaker wants Jets to return to Queens: 'Would be monumental'
description: The New York Jets have not played a home game in New York since 1983, but a senator in the state wants the team to return to its roots.

title: Deion Sanders asked about Colorado head coach job in hilarious way by reporter
description: There's the straight-forward way to ask sensitive questions to coaches, and then there's the unique way one reporter asked Jackson State's Deion Sanders about coaching elsewhere.

title: SCOTUS poll: Where Democrats and Republicans stand on race-based college admissions
description: A new Marquette Law School poll found 41% of Americans disapprove of a student's race being factored into college admissions. The Supreme Court is hearing cases on that topic.

title: Jesse Watters: You can have a strong border and you can have a humane and rational asylum policy
description: Fox News host Jesse Watters calls out President Joe Biden's handling of the crisis on the United States-Mexico border on Wednesday's "The Five."

title: Bills' Von Miller confirms Odell Beckham Jr. visit: 'It ain't over till it's over'
description: Buffalo Bills linebacker Von Miller confirmed on his podcast this week that Super Bowl champion Odell Beckham Jr. to visit with the team on Friday.

title: Chicago police looking for two suspects in killing of teenager sitting on a porch
description: A Chicago teenager was shot and killed on Tuesday by two males armed with handguns who fled after committing the crime, according to police.
